import sys
input = lambda: sys.stdin.readline().rstrip("\r\n")
inp = lambda: list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().rstrip("\r\n").split()))

tc = 1
tc, = inp()
for _ in range(tc):
	n, = inp()
	if n==1:
		print('*')
		continue
	n = n//2+1
	print('*')
	a = [' ']*(n)
	a[0] = '*'
	a[1] = '*'
	print()
	for i in range(1,n-1):
		print('*'+' '*(i-1)+'*')
		print()
	print('*'+' '*(n-2)+'*')
	print()
	for i in range(n-2,0,-1):
		print('*'+' '*(i-1)+'*')
		print()
	print('*')
